archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Educational/informational materials published by the Blue Ridge Discovery Center.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Blue Ridge Discovery Center Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Blue Ridge Discovery Center Collection, Ms2012-004, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Blue Ridge Discovery Center Collection was donated to Special Collections in 2012.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing and description of the Blue Ridge Discovery Center Collection commenced and was completed in March, 2012.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Founded in 2008, the Blue Ridge Discovery Center is a non-profit environmental organization whose purpose, according to its website, is to inspire "creativity, discovery, and critical thinking through interest-driven and hands on activities focused on the Blue Ridge Mountains." In promoting conservation and creativity, the center collaborates with regional educational and outdoor institutions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains educational/informational materials published by Blue Ridge Discovery Center, a non-profit organization dedicated to hands-on learning opportunities promoting environmental awareness among the communities in Virginia's Blue Ridge Mountains. Within the collection is a poster published by the center in 2011 titled "The Aquatic Macroinvertebrates of Wilson Creek, Grayson County, VA."

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

did.unittitle: "The Aquatic Macroinvertebrates of Wilson Creek, Grayson County, VA" poster, 2011
